珟字的基本解释

珟
sù
古同“玊”。

珟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
(1)朽玉，有瑕疵的玉。
(2)姓。

珟字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珟； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页730第28
【廣韻】息逐切【集韻】息六切，?音肅。【廣韻】朽玉也。又姓。　又【集韻】琢玉工。【正字通】按諸家以王字點在中畫者，朽玉也，姓也，音粟。本註音義與前王註同。攺作珟，非。考姓譜有夙姓，無珟姓，諸家皆誤也。

珟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
珟字的起名意思

暂无。

sù
Gu Tong "Yi".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
(1) Rotten jade, defective jade.
(2) Last name.
Min
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珟; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 730 28
[Guang Yun] Breathing and cutting [Jiyun] Breathing in six cuttings, sound and su. [Guangyun] Rotten jade. Another surname.　[Jiyun] Crafting jade. [Zhengzitong] According to the characters of kings in the Chinese painting, the dying jade, the surname, and the Yinsu. The phonetic and meaning of this note is the same as that of the previous Wang's note. Min Zuozhen, no. The test surname has Su surname but no Min surname, and every family is wrong.
